class_notes: This is a pre-term that will meet Monday, 1/8 through Friday, 1/12. 8:30AM-5:30PM
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530. Uses a series of case studies to teach the principles and practice of epidemiology, ranging from surveillance and descriptive epidemiology to outbreak investigations and analytic methods. Focuses on the use of sound epidemiological judgment. Cross listed with EPI 531.
schedule_location: MTWThF 8:30am-5:30pm in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R100
